title.rendered: IMMO at Bisnow’s Single-Family Rental Outlook

content.rendered:
Our Chief Investment Officer, Samantha Kempe, joins a Bisnow panel discussion moderated by leading real estate strategist, Andrew Baum. In this webinar, Sam explores the rise of the single-family rental (SFR) asset class in Europe alongside industry experts from CBRE, Greystar and MARK.

Watch the webinar to find out:

  • How existing SFR is defined compared to BTR
  • The size of the market in Europe and how to tap into dispersed residential assets
  • The scale of the opportunity and how it can be delivered viably in a low-yield sector
  • The tools, data and technology needed to unlock SFR in Europe
